SPECIFICATIONS

Compatibility

  • iPhone iOS 7 & up
  • Andriod 4.3 & uptexts
  • Bluetooth 4.0
  • Notification for calls / texts

App

  • Set daily goals
  • Analyze history
  • Sync to phone & cloud
  • Connect to Apple health kit
  • Connect to Google fit
  • Watch firmware upgrade

Vibration silent alarms

  • Phone notifications
  • Daily goal reached
  • Daily wake-ui alarm
  • Location assistance
  • Accessibility features

Watch

  • 12.6mm thickness
  • 3.16L stainless steel case
  • 40mm diameter
  • 5 ATM water resistant
  • Sapphire glass crystal

Activity Tracking

  • Step counting
  • Distance
  • Calories burned
  • Swimming (strokes)

Timekeeping

  • Swiss ETA movement
  • Accurate reliable

Battery power

  • Standard CR2025 6+ months
  • Standard 364 for timekeeping 5+ years
  • Solar Power available as gupgrade

Sensors

  • MEMS 3-axis accelerometer
  • Highly accurate
  • Low power consumption
